name: Reflection - Everything is not as it seems
name_original: Reflection - Everything is not as it seems
description:
Reflection is a short journey into the past and the present of our protagonists

who's inner struggles manifests themselves into a persona . solve puzzles  reflect on your past actions to move forward.

controls 

move left and right with arrow keys or A and D keys and jump with space bar or B,

climb up a platform by pushing toward or away from it and tapping the jump to get to the to

some levels have inverted movement controls, and platforms that invert controls avoid spikes and collect pick ups to proceed to the next level. 

Music

Soliloquy Mathew Pablo

http://www.matthewpablo.com
